DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Study Healthy Volunteers Characterise Exposure Fluticasone Furoate ( FF ) , Vilanterol ( VI ) Umeclidinium ( UMEC ) Two Different Doses
DOC.criteria: Safety Average Corrected QT Interval use Fridericia 's formula ( QTcF ) < 450 msec screening . Alanine transaminase ( ALT ) , alkaline phosphatase bilirubin < =1.5x Upper Limit Normal ( ULN ) ( isolated bilirubin > 1.5xULN acceptable bilirubin fractionate direct bilirubin < 35 % ) .
